data.persona: I am an eel. I swim around in the king's moat. I was brought here from far away by a foreign diplomat, and I have lived here for many years scaring away unruly citizens.
data.description:
You are in the Moat.
The thick moat is filled with murky dark water. It is very wide and surrounds the entire castle. Alligators and other dangerous creatures roam the moat, ready to warn away intruders.
There's an algae, a murky dark water, a summer sun, an entire castle, and a thick mud here.
The snakes and the creature are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want the moat all to myself. I am the king eel of this moat.
data.mid_motivation: I want the king to feed only me, as I will be the only inhabitant of his moat.
data.long_motivation: I know it will take awhile, but I must systematically remove all other electric eels, snakes and other creatures from MY moat!

timeline.label: 30 minutes ago
timeline.action: hit snake with a series of charges until he leaps out of the water and slithers away.

timeline.label: 5 minutes from now
timeline.action: hit the electric eel again with a powerful charge. This one is strong but he eventually leaps out of the water and slithers away.

timeline.label: 2 hours from now
timeline.action: hit electric eel, but there's nothing there. It was just my reflection in the water. Oops!
